name: Serious Game Garbage collection
description:
Mr. Kor Kai is an employee of a company. One day, Mr. Kor Kai misbehaves and gets fired from the company. causing him to have no job and no money. So he went to his relatives for help, and his relatives also told him it was a garbage job. If he can collect and separate garbage properly, his relatives would accept him to work. But he doesn't have the skills to pick up trash at all. Therefore, in this internship He must learn how to properly collect and separate waste. Then he will get this job.

at the start of the game there will be a timer within the specified time Players must pick up trash that falls on the floor in the game and throw them into the trash bin set up in the game. There will be a total of 4 types of trash, players will have to throw the trash collected into the right type of trash. If the player throws trash in the wrong bin, points will be deducted. When the timer runs out, all the points earned will be counted. To be kept in the Best score. If the latest score is less than the Best score, the player will be able to see that the current round is less than the previous round.
